lead_paragraph: The leader of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Philadelphia on Tuesday attacked GOP presidential candidate Donald Trump's call for ending automatic citizenship for children born to immigrants living illegally in the U.S., saying the idea "plays on our worst fears and resentments."

headline.main: Archbishop Assails Trump Over Birthright Citizenship Repeal
headline.print_headline: Archbishop Assails Trump Over Birthright Citizenship Repeal
